Legendary Combinations
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Studio (Combining/Breeding): Legendary Combinations
By GoldenBoy on Friday, January 3, 2003 - 10:12 pm:

I'm beginning to test for different breeding
combos that make legends

Diva+ Monol= Ragnaroks
Gali+ Joker= Archreaper
Pixie+ Special Durahan= Valkyrie
Golem+ Special Henger= Gobi

thx to coldpower27 for getting me going and
discovering the Pixie.

Anyone find a combo, post it here!

By Thorr on Monday, January 6, 2003 - 05:42 am:

Just a quick note, the Gobi combination will not work at all until you have unlocked Legendary Golems. I still haven't done this yet since I am trying to get other legends. The combo will not work for me. However, it does work for GB who has already unlocked Legendary Golems.

This may or may not be true for other legends, but I have a feeling that it is. The exception is Ragnaroks. But, if you think about it, you need to have a legendary dragon (Diva) to make the Ragnaroks combination in the first place.

-Thorr

By GoldenBoy on Wednesday, January 22, 2003 - 09:59 am:

Once you have gotten the Tiger, Mocchi, or Arrowhead Legends, the following combos become possible:

Tiger+ Gali= Whitehound
Mocchi+ Zan= Devi
Arrowhead+ Joke= Serket

By Gizmo the Lemur on Wednesday, January 22, 2003 - 01:40 pm:

Mew + Hare= Eared Mew

Thanks for letting me post this, gb.

By GoldenBoy on Thursday, January 23, 2003 - 12:45 pm:

This is the final list of Legendary combos
-they are available after you finish the events that open that type of legend.
-any restrictiions mentioned above DO NOT APPLY. Any Dragon+ any monol will have Ragnaroks as a 4th option once you open him.
-it is unknown if certain combos make other legends, but it is doubtful.

Final List
Monster1Monster2Legend
ArrowheadJokerSerket
DragonMonolRagnaroks
GolemHengerGobi
JokerGaliArchreaper
MocchiZanDevi
PixieDurahanValkyrie
SuzurinGitanDrarin
TigerGaliWhitehound


Thanks to Thorr, Coldpower27, and Gizmo
